tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE knowledge_assets ( 
  knowledge_asset_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  title STRING,
  description STRING,
  parent_asset_id UUID,
  FOREIGN KEY (parent_asset_id) REFERENCES knowledge_assets(knowledge_asset_id) 
);

CREATE TABLE asset_links (
    link_id INT,
    asset_id INT,
    source_id INT,
    link_type TEXT,
    PRIMARY KEY (link_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (asset_id) REFERENCES knowledge_assets(asset_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (source_id) REFERENCES information_sources(source_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Links (
   link_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   source_asset_id INT,
   target_asset_id INT,
   link_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
   FOREIGN KEY (source_asset_id) REFERENCES KnowledgeAssets(id),
   FOREIGN KEY (target_asset_id) REFERENCES KnowledgeAssets(id)
);

CREATE TABLE Concepts (
   concept_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   concept_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
   description TEXT,
   related_assets JSON,
   related_concepts JSON
);

CREATE TABLE Connections (
   connection_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   asset_id INT,
   concept_id INT,
   connection_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
   FOREIGN KEY (asset_id) REFERENCES KnowledgeAssets(id),
   FOREIGN KEY (concept_id) REFERENCES Concepts(concept_id)
);
